title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder changes with settings
description: When reopening the hyperlink builder after clicking on 'OK', the title of the hyperlink builder changes to 'www.actuate.com' instead of 'Hyperlink Options'.
OB: After clicking on 'OK' and reopening the hyperlink builder, the title is 'www.actuate.com'
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options'
SR:
1. Click on 'OK' in the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder and check the title.
